name: Android-Universal-Image-Loader
desc: 强大灵活的图片异步加载显示缓存工具

name: EventBus
desc: EventBus是发布和订阅事件的最佳选择

name: butterknife
desc: 绑定Android View 界面,自动注入View属性,回调click等事件

name: MPAndroidChart
desc: 一个强大的Android报表库,支持缩放,拖拽和动画

children.name: Line Chart
children.desc: A simple demonstration of the linechart.

children.name: Line Chart (Dual YAxis)
children.desc: Demonstration of the linechart with dual y-axis.

children.name: Bar Chart
children.desc: A simple demonstration of the bar chart.

children.name: Horizontal Bar Chart
children.desc: A simple demonstration of the horizontal bar chart.

children.name: Combined Chart
children.desc: Demonstrates how to create a combined chart (bar and line in this case).

children.name: Pie Chart
children.desc: A simple demonstration of the pie chart.

children.name: Scatter Chart
children.desc: A simple demonstration of the scatter chart.

children.name: Bubble Chart
children.desc: A simple demonstration of the bubble chart.

children.name: Stacked Bar Chart
children.desc: A simple demonstration of a bar chart with stacked bars.

children.name: Stacked Bar Chart Negative
children.desc: A simple demonstration of stacked bars with negative and positive values.

children.name: Another Bar Chart
children.desc: Implementation of a BarChart that only shows values at the bottom.

children.name: Multiple Lines Chart
children.desc: A line chart with multiple DataSet objects. One color per DataSet.

children.name: Multiple Bars Chart
children.desc: A bar chart with multiple DataSet objects. One multiple colors per DataSet.

children.name: Charts in ViewPager Fragments
children.desc: Demonstration of charts inside ViewPager Fragments. In this example the focus was on the design and look and feel of the chart.

children.name: BarChart inside ListView
children.desc: Demonstrates the usage of a BarChart inside a ListView item.

children.name: Multiple charts inside ListView
children.desc: Demonstrates the usage of different chart types inside a ListView.

children.name: Inverted Line Chart
children.desc: Demonstrates the feature of inverting the y-axis.

children.name: Candle Stick Chart
children.desc: Demonstrates usage of the CandleStickChart.

children.name: Cubic Line Chart
children.desc: Demonstrates cubic lines in a LineChart.

children.name: Radar Chart
children.desc: Demonstrates the use of a spider-web like (net) chart.

children.name: Colored Line Chart
children.desc: Shows a LineChart with different background and line color.

children.name: Realtime Chart
children.desc: This chart is fed with new data in realtime. It also restrains the view on the x-axis.

children.name: Dynamical data adding
children.desc: This Activity demonstrates dynamical adding of Entries and DataSets (real time graph).

children.name: Performance Line Chart
children.desc: Renders up to 30.000 objects smoothly.

children.name: Sinus Bar Chart
children.desc: A Bar Chart plotting the sinus function with 8.000 values.

children.name: Chart in ScrollView
children.desc: This demonstrates how to use a chart inside a ScrollView.

children.name: BarChart positive / negative
children.desc: This demonstrates how to create a BarChart with positive and negative values in different colors.

children.name: Realm.io Database
children.desc: This demonstrates how to use this library with Realm.io mobile database.
